<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If \\param &#91;in&#93; BB has more than one predecessor that is a conditional</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// branch, attempt to use parallel and/or for the branch condition. \\returns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// true on success.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Before:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ......</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %cmp10 = fcmp une float %tmp1, %tmp2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   br i1 %cmp10, label %if.then, label %lor.rhs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// lor.rhs:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ......</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %cmp11 = fcmp une float %tmp3, %tmp4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   br i1 %cmp11, label %if.then, label %ifend</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if.end:  // the merge block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ......</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if.then: // has two predecessors, both of them contains conditional branch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ......</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   br label %if.end;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// After:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  ......</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  %cmp10 = fcmp une float %tmp1, %tmp2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  ......</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  %cmp11 = fcmp une float %tmp3, %tmp4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  %cmp12 = or i1 %cmp10, %cmp11    // parallel-or mode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  br i1 %cmp12, label %if.then, label %ifend</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  if.end:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    ......</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  if.then:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    ......</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    br label %if.end;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  Current implementation handles two cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  Case 1: BB is on the else-path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///          BB1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        /     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       BB2    |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      /   \\   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     BB3   \\  |     where, BB1, BB2 contain conditional branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      \\    |  /     BB3 contains unconditional branch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       \\   | /      BB4 corresponds to BB which is also the merge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  BB =&gt; BB4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  Corresponding source code:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  if (a == b &amp;&amp; c == d)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    statement; // BB3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  Case 2: BB is on the then-path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///             BB1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///          /      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         |      BB2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         \\    /    |  where BB1, BB2 contain conditional branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  BB =&gt;   BB3      |  BB3 contains unconditiona branch and corresponds</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///           \\     /    to BB.  BB4 is the merge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///             BB4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  Corresponding source code:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  if (a == b || c == d)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    statement;  // BB3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  In both cases, BB is the common successor of conditional branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  In Case 1, BB (BB4) has an unconditional branch (BB3) as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  its predecessor.  In Case 2, BB (BB3) only has conditional branches</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  as its predecessors.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;LastCondBlock = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check predecessors of \\param BB.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All predecessors should terminate with a branch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!PBI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PP = Pred-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a59fb91d1691350f7d1b8e8a114e3f2a4">getSinglePredecessor</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#ad56f6a9b5cd05940017c4544df48bc30">isUnconditional</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Case 1: Pred (BB3) is an unconditional block, it should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have a single predecessor (BB2) that is also a predecessor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of \\param BB (BB4) and should not have address-taken.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There should exist only one such unconditional</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branch among the predecessors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UnCondBlock || !PP || !Preds.contains(PP) ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">      UnCondBlock = Pred;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only conditional branches are allowed beyond this point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#a7e4be8b16fbd68c9045a388904044e01">isConditional</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Condition&#39;s unique use should be the branch instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;PC = PBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aebd4af5642453ce3169094f08dd3d7b8">getCondition</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These are internal condition blocks to be merged from, e.g.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BB2 in both cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Should not be address-taken.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pred-&gt;hasAddressTaken())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> BI = Pred-&gt;begin(), BE = PBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the condition block to be merged into, e.g. BB1 in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// both cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FirstCondBlock)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find whether BB is uniformly on the true (or false) path</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PS1 = PBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PS is the successor which is not BB. Check successors to identify</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Case 1</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Case 1: PS(BB3) should be an unconditional branch.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If PS1 does not jump into PS2, but PS2 jumps into PS1,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!PBI1 || !PBI1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#ad56f6a9b5cd05940017c4544df48bc30">isUnconditional</a>() ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether PS2 jumps into PS1.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!PBI2 || !PBI2-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#ad56f6a9b5cd05940017c4544df48bc30">isUnconditional</a>() ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do branch inversion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;CurrBlock = LastCondBlock;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EverChanged = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Check whether \\param BB is the merge block of a if-region.  If yes, check</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// whether there exists an adjacent if-region upstream, the two if-regions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// contain identical instructions and can be legally merged.  \\returns true if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the two if-regions are merged.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// From:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if (a)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   statement;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if (b)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   statement;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// To:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if (a || b)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   statement;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// And from:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if (a)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   statement;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if (b)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   statement;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// To:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if (a &amp;&amp; b)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   statement;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// We always take the form of the first if-region. This means that if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// statement in the first if-region, is in the &quot;then-path&quot;, while in the second</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if-region it is in the &quot;else-path&quot;, then we convert the second to the first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// form, by inverting the condition and the branch successors. The same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// approach goes for the opposite case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FlattenCFGOpt::MergeIfRegion(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We cannot merge the if-region if the merge point has phi nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a63cfb2a0dae69153fd961eb335949caa">front</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;IfTrue2, &#42;IfFalse2;</span></CodeLine>
